name: Biceps Curl With Cable
how_to_perform:
1. Stand in front of a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Hold the end of the cable with both hands, with your arms extended and your palms facing forward (away from your body).
3. Keeping your upper arms still, curl the weight forward by bending your elbows.
4. Focus on contracting your biceps muscles as you curl the weight up.
5. Lower the weight back to the starting position by straightening your elbows, keeping your core engaged throughout.
6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: The Biceps Curl With Cable is an isolation exercise that targets the biceps muscle group, performed using a cable machine.
